thread.title: Apple's HomePod hits stores, late in the game

title: Apple's HomePod hits stores, late in the game
text:
Apple's HomePod hits stores, late in the game Saturday, February 10, 2018 - 02:04 
Apple's smart speaker HomePod finally hit stores on Friday. Reuters Stephen Nellis tried it out and says it's not only late to the game compared with Amazon's Echo, it's also still missing some functions. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Apple's smart speaker HomePod finally hit stores on Friday. Reuters Stephen Nellis tried it out and says it's not only late to the game compared with Amazon's Echo, it's also still missing some functions. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2ExF7sg
